Translations.Text: Ibrahim ne kaha “aey farstaadgaan-e-ilaahi (envoys), kya mohim aapko dar-pesh hai
Unhon ne kaha “hum ek mujrim qaum ki taraf bheje gaye hain
Taa-ke uspar paki hui mitti ke patthar (clay-stones) barsa de
Jo aapke Rubb ke haan hadd se guzar jane walon ke liye nishan zada hain”
Phir humne un sab logon ko nikal liya jo us basti mein momin thay
Aur wahan humne ek ghar ke siwa musalmano ka koi ghar na paya
Uske baad humne wahan bas ek nishani un logon ke liye chodh di jo dardnaak azaab se darte hon
Aur (tumhare liye nishani hai) Moosa ke qissey mein jab humne usey sareeh sanad (clear authority) ke saath Firoun ke paas bheja
To woh apne bal-bootay par akad gaya aur bola yeh jaadugar hai ya majnoon(deewana) hai
Aakhir-e-kaar humne usey aur uske lashkaron ko pakda aur sabko samandar mein phenk diya aur woh malamat zadah hokar reh gaya
Aur (tumhare liye nishani hai) Aad (people of Aad) mein, jabke humne unpar ek aisi hi bay-khair(devastating) hawa bhej di
Ke jis cheez par bhi woh guzar gayi usey boseeda (rotten) karke rakh diya
Aur (tumhare liye nishani hai) Samood mein, jab unse kaha gaya tha ke ek khaas waqt tak mazey karlo
Magar is tambeeh(warning) par bhi unhon ne apne Rubb ke hukum se sartabi (brazenly disobey) ki. Aakhir-e-kar unke dekhte dekhte ek achanak toot padne waley azaab ne unko aa liya
Phir na unmein uthne ki sakat thi aur na woh apna bachao kar sakte thay
Aur in sabse pehle humne Nooh ki qaum ko halaak kiya kyunke woh fasiq (wicked) log thay
Aasman ko humne apne zoar se banaya hai aur hum iski qudrat rakhte hain
Zameen ko humne bichaya hai aur hum badey acchey hamwar(Smoothers/ spread) karne waley hain
Aur har cheez ke humne jodey banaye hain, shayad ke tum ussey sabaq lo
To daudo Allah ki taraf , main tumahre liye us ki taraf se saaf saaf khabardar karne wala hoon
Aur na banao Allah ke saath koi dusra mabood. Main tumahre liye uski taraf se saaf saaf khabardar karne wala hoon
Yunhi hota raha hai, inse pehle ki qaumon ke paas bhi koi Rasool aisa nahin aaya jisey unhon ne yeh na kaha ho ke yeh saahir (sorcerer) hai ya majnoon(deewana)
Kya in sab ne apas mein ispar koi samjhauta karliya hai? Nahin, balke yeh sab sarkash log hain
Pas aey Nabi, inse rukh pher lo, tumpar kuch malamat nahin
Albatta nasihat karte raho, kyunke nasihat imaan laney walon ke liye nafeh(faiyda-mand) hai
Maine Jinn aur Insano ko iske siwa kisi kaam ke liye paida nahin kiya hai ke woh meri bandagi karein
Main unsey koi rizq nahin chahta aur na yeh chahta hoon ke woh mujhey khilayein
Allah to khud hi Razzak hai, badi quwwat wala aur zabardast
Pas jin logon ne zulm kiya hai unke hissey ka bhi waisa hi azaab tayyar hai jaisa inhi jaise logon ko unke hissey ka mil chuka hai, iske liye yeh log jaldi na machayein
Aakhir ko tabahi hai kufr karne walon ke liye us roz jiska inhein khauff dilaya jaa raha hai
Kasam hai Tur (Mount) ki
Aur ek aisi khuli kitaab ki
Jo raqeeq jild(fine parchment) mein likkhi hui hai
Aur aabaad (much-frequented) ghar ki
Aur unchi chatt (canopy) ki
Aur maujzan samandar (swelling sea) ki
Ke tere Rubb ka azaab zaroor waqeh honay wala hai
Jisey koi dafa karne wala nahin
Woh us roz waqeh hoga jab aasmaan buri tarah dagmagayega
Aur pahad udey udey phirenge
Tabahi hai us roz un jhutlane walon ke liye
Jo aaj khel ke taur par apni hujjat baaziyon mein lagey huey hain
Jis din unhein dhakke maar maar kar naar-e-jahannum (fire of hell) ki taraf le chala jayega
Us waqt unse kaha jayega ke “ yeh wahi aag hai jisey tum jhutlaya karte thay
Ab batao yeh jaadu hai ya tumhein soojh nahin raha hai
Jao ab jhulso iske andar, tum khwa sabr karo ya na karo, tumhare liye yaksan hai, tumhein waisa hi badla diya ja raha hai jaise tum amal kar rahey thay
Muttaqi log wahan baagon (gardens) aur niyamaton mein hongey
Lutf le rahe hongey un cheezon se jo unka Rubb unhein dega, aur unka Rubb unhein dozakh ke azaab se bacha lega
(Unse kaha jayega) khao aur peo mazey se apne un aamaal ke siley mein jo tum karte rahey ho
Woh aamne saamne bichey huey takhaton(thrones) par takiye(couches) lagaye baithey hongey aur hum khoobsurat aankhon waali hoorein unse biyah (marry) denge

Jo log imaan laaye hain aur unki aulad bhi kisi darja-e-imaan mein unke naksh-e-qadam par chali hai unki us aulad ko bhi hun (jannat mein) unke saath mila denge aur unke amaal mein koi ghaata(loss) unko na denge. Har shaks apne kasb ke aevaz rehan hai.( Every person is pledged to what he did)
Hum unko har tarah ke phal (fruits) aur gosht , jis cheez ko bhi unka ji chahega khoob diye chale jayenge
Wahan woh ek dusre se jaam-e-sharaab lapak lapak kar le rahey hongey jis mein na yawa-goyi (ill speech) hogi na bad-kirdari
Aur unki khidmat mein woh ladke daudte (running) phir rahey hongey jo unhi ke liye makhsoos hongey, aisey khoobsurat jaise chupa kar rakkhe huey moti(pearls)
Yeh log apas mein ek dusre se (duniya mein guzre huey) halaat puchenge
Yeh kahenge ke hum pehle apne ghar waalon mein darte huey zindagi basar karte thay
Aakhir e kaar Allah ne hum par fazl farmaya aur humein jhulsa dene wali hawa ke azaab se bacha liya
Hum pichli zindagi mein usi se duaein maangte thay, woh waqai bada hi Mohsin (beneficent) aur Raheem hai
Pas aey nabi, tum nasihat kiye jao, apne Rubb ke fazal se na tum kaahin (soothsayer) ho aur na majnoon (madman)
Kya yeh log kehte hain ke yeh shaks shayar hai jiske haqq mein hum gardish-e-ayyam (misfortune) ke intizaar kar rahe hain
Inse kaho, accha intizaar karo, main bhi tumhare saath intizaar karta hoon
Kya inki aqalein(minds) inhein aisi hi baatein karne ke liye kehti hain? Ya dar-haqeeqat yeh inaad (transgression)mein hadd se guzare huey log hain
Kya ye kehte hain ke is shaks ne yeh quraan khud ghad (invented/fabricated) liya hai? Asal baat yeh hai ke yeh imaan nahin lana chahte
Agar yeh apne is qaul (saying) mein sacche hain to isi shaan ka ek kalaam bana layein
Kya yeh kisi khaliq ke bagair khud paida ho gaye hain? Ya yeh khud apne khaliq hain
Ya zameen aur aasmaano ko inhon ne paida kiya hai? Asal baat yeh hai ke yeh yaqeen nahin rakhte
Kya tere Rubb ke khazane in ke kabze mein hain? Ya un par inhi ka hukum chalta hai
Kya inke paas koi seedi(ladder) hai jispar chadh kar yeh ilm-e-baala ki sun-gun letey hain? In mein se jisne sun-gun li ho woh laaye ko khuli daleel
Kya Allah ke liye to hain betiyan aur tum logon ke liye hain betay (sons)
Kya tum insey koi ajar maangte ho key eh zabardasti padi hui chatti ke bojh taley dabey jatey hain (burdened with a load of debt)
Kya inke paas gaib ke haqaiq ka ilm hai ke uski bina par yeh likh rahe hoon
Kya yeh koi chaal chalna chahte hain? (agar yeh baat hai) to kufr karne walon par in ki chaal ulti hi padegi
Kya Allah ke siwa yeh koi aur maabood rakhte hain? Allah paak hai us shirk se jo yeh log kar rahey hain
Yeh log aasmaan ke tukde bhi girte huye dekh lein to kahenge yeh baadal hain jo umdey chale aa rahe hain
Pas aey nabi, inhein inke haal par chodh do yahan tak ke yeh apne us din ko pahunch jayein jismein yeh maar giraye jayenge
Jis din na inki apni koi chaal inke kisi kaam aayegi na koi inki madad ko aayega
Aur us waqt ke aane se pehle bhi zalimon ke liye ek azaab hai, magar in mein se aksar jaante nahin hain
Aey Nabi , apne Rubb ka faisla aane tak sabr karo. Tum hamari nigaah mein ho. Tum jab utho to apne Rubb ki hamd ke saath uski tasbeeh karo
Raat ko bhi uski tasbeeh kiya karo aur sitare jab palat-te hain us waqt bhi
Kasam hai taare ki jabke woh guroob hua
Tumhara rafeeq(companion) na bhatka hai na behka(deluded) hai
Woh apni khwaish-e-nafs se nahin bolta
Yeh to ek wahee (Inspiration /revelation) hai jo uspar nazil ki jati hai
Usey zabardast quwwat waley ne taleem di hai
Jo bada sahib-e-hikmat hai
Woh saamne aa khada hua jabke woh balaii ufuq par tha(highest part of the horizon)
Phir kareeb aaya aur upar muallak ho gaya.(approached and descended)
Yahan tak ke do kamano (bow lengths) ke barabar ya issey kuch kam faasla reh gaya
Tab usne Allah ke banday ko wahee (revelation) pahunchayi jo wahee (revelation) bhi usey pahunchani thi
Nazar ne jo kuch dekha, dil ne usmein jhoot na milaya
Ab kya tum us cheez par ussey jhagadte ho jisey woh aankhon se dekhta hai
Aur ek martaba phir usney

Jahan paas hi jannat-ul-maawa hai

Aur usney apne Rubb ki badi badi nishaniyan dekhi
Ab zara batao , tumne kabhi is Laat aur is Uzza (names of pagan idols)
Aur tisri (third) ek aur devi Manaat ki haqeeqat par kuch gaur bhi kiya
Kya betay (sons) tumhare liye hain aur betiyan (daughters) khuda ke liye
Yeh to badi dhandhli (unjust/unfair) ki taqseem hui

Darasal yeh kuch nahin hain magar bas chandh naam jo tumne aur tumhare baap dada ne rakh liye hain. Allah ne inke liye koi sanad nazil nahin ki. Haqeeat yeh hai ke log mehez weham-o-gumaan ki pairvi kar rahey hain aur khwahishaat-e-nafs ke mureed bane huey hain, halanke unke Rubb ki taraf se unke paas hidayat aa chuki hai
Kya insaan jo kuch chaahe uske liye wahi haqq hai
Duniya aur aakhirat ka maalik to Allah hi hai

Aasmano mein kitne hi farishte maujood hain, un ki shafaat (intercession) kuch bhi kaam nahin aa sakti jab tak ke Allah kisi aisey shaks ke haqq mein uski ijazat na dey jiske liye woh koi arzdaasht (plea) sunna chahe aur usko pasand karey

Aur zameen aur aasmaano ki har cheez ka maalik Allah hi hai. Taa-ke Allah burayi karne waalon ko unke amal ka badla de aur un logon ko acchi jaza se nawaze jinhon ne neik rawayya ikhtiyar kiya hai

Jo badey badey gunahon aur khule khule qabeeh afaal (shameful deeds) se parheiz karte hain, illa yeh ke kuch kasoor unse sarzad ho jaye. Bila shubhah tere Rubb ka daaman-e-magfirat bahut waseeh hai. Woh tumhein us waqt se khoob jaanta hai jab usne zameen se tumhein paida kiya, aur jab tum apni maaon (mothers) ke paiton (wombs) mein abhi janin (fetuses) hi thay.
